Articles.Content:
**SOHO Solar Probe**

A quick release! SOHO is the probe that gives you all those pretty videos of solar flares, but I doubt you've ever heard of it. Not named after New York.

**Craft Info:** 65 parts, 2.3 tons. 850 m/s of dv for corrections.

Beauty shots!

![EzLZ6lg.png](http://i.imgur.com/EzLZ6lg.png)

![4M6reGi.png](http://i.imgur.com/4M6reGi.png)

![lhJzguA.png](http://i.imgur.com/lhJzguA.png)

Thanks for viewing, and leave some rep if you enjoyed!
maybe include a pic of the real spacecraft for comparison

Very nice, as always!

Clever use of rover bodies.

+rep
